```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(extrafont)
#font_import()
loadfonts(device = "win")

library(foot)
library(geosphere)
library(osmdata)
library(sf)
library(stplanr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tmap)
library(wesanderson)

tmap_options(design.mode = TRUE)
tmap_mode("plot")
```

## Get Data

```{r}
# Load buildings previously saved from OSM

bruHighways <- readRDS(here::here("2021/data/rawData/bruHighways.rds")) %>% 
  select(osm_id,
         highway,
         geometry) %>% 
  st_transform(3857)
```

## Wrangle Data

```{r}
# Now, I want a minimum bounding box

bruBound <- bruHighways %>% 
  st_bbox() %>% 
  st_as_sfc()

mapBound <- bruBound %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  st_buffer(7000)

mapLimit <- bruBound %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  st_buffer(7500)
```

```{r}
# Clip highways to the mapbounds

bruHighways <- bruHighways %>% 
  st_intersection(mapBound)
```

```{r}
# Filter by type

bruHighwaysFilter <- bruHighways %>% 
  filter(highway == "motorway" |
           highway == "primary" |
           highway == "secondary" |
           highway == "tertiary" |
           highway == "residential")
```

## Build Map

```{r}
# Build the base layer

vizBase <-  tm_shape(mapBound) +
  tm_fill(col = "#f1eee9") +
  tm_layout(bg.color = "#f1eee9",
            frame = F,
            frame.lwd = NA,
            attr.outside = F,
            outer.margins = 0,
            asp = 0,
            scale = 0.8,
            main.title = "OSM ID Street Map",
            main.title.color = "#000000",
            main.title.size = 1.75,
            main.title.fontfamily = "Arial Narrow",
            main.title.fontface = 2,
            main.title.position = "center",
            title = "Brussels Capital Region",
            title.color = "#000000",
            title.size = 1,
            title.position = c("center", "TOP"),
            title.fontface = 2) + 
  tm_credits("#30DayMapChallenge | Day 05 | Anirudh Govind | Nov 2021\nMap data Â© OpenStreetMap contributors and available from https://www.openstreetmap.org",
             col = "#000000",
             size = 0.75,
             position = c("left", "bottom"),
             fontfamily = "Arial Narrow")
```

```{r}
# Buildings layer

myPalette <- wes_palette("BottleRocket2")

vizStr <- tm_shape(bruHighwaysFilter) +
  tm_lines(col = "#000000",
           alpha = 0.1) +
  tm_text(text = "osm_id",
          col = "#000000",
          palette = myPalette,
          size = 0.20,
          along.lines = T,
          remove.overlap = T,
          legend.col.show = F,
          legend.size.show = F)
```

```{r}
# Combine layers

viz <- vizBase +
  vizStr
```

## Export

```{r}
# Export the map as an image to upload onto twitter

tmap_save(tm = viz,
          filename = here::here("2021/exports/Day5.png"),
          dpi = 450,
          width = 200,
          height = 200,
          units = "mm")

```
